FeaturedItem.Title: Summer Blockbusters
FeaturedItem.Copy: The biggest stars and budgets vie for first place at the box office in the summer. Romance, comedy, drama, and sci-fi light up the screen this year. Get a sneak peek at the top cinema stories of 2009.
